subject: rig compatibility
description_text:
hello,

I am wondering if your Pro X Ultra pedals fit my Trak Racer TR8 Pro rig 
pedal plate? Have your customers installed them on that rig already? And 
also wondering if you ships your packeges from some EU warehouses and 
thus no custom payments are required on your EU clients sides?

all the best

Jacek from Poland

conversations.body_text: Hi Jacek,     You can measure the hole spacing on the image to see if it matches your rig. Additionally, we can ship from our German warehouse, eliminating any additional costs like customs duties.  https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-racing-sim-pedal-pro-x-ultra
